metadata.title: Shiori Chan
metadata.description: Shiori Chan is a bookmark manager that allows you to save and organize your bookmarks.

Signup.subtitle: Create your account
Signup.sign_up_disabled_message: New user registration is currently disabled. Please contact the administrator if you need access.
Signup.name: Name
Signup.email_info_popover: Drop any email here. We won't send you jack. Fake emails welcome (just don't forget it, genius).

AppShell.sign_out_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

BookmarkForm.metadata_fetch_failed_message: Could not fetch metadata from URL. You can still enter details manually.
BookmarkForm.description_placeholder_with_suggestions: Enter description or select from suggestions above

EditBookmarkModal.success_message: Your bookmark has been updated successfully.
EditBookmarkModal.error_message: An error occurred while updating the bookmark. Please try again.

NewBookmarkModal.success_message: Your bookmark has been created successfully.
NewBookmarkModal.error_message: An error occurred while creating the bookmark. Please try again.

EditCollectionModal.success_message: Your collection has been updated successfully.
EditCollectionModal.error_message: An error occurred while updating the collection. Please try again.

NewCollectionModal.success_message: Your collection has been created successfully.
NewCollectionModal.error_message: An error occurred while creating the collection. Please try again.

Settings_General.title: General
Settings_General.language_description: Select your preferred language for the application

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Manage your preferences and configure your application settings.

Settings_Layout.title: Layout
Settings_Layout.description: Customize how your content is displayed and organized.
Settings_Layout.layout_mode_description: Choose how your bookmarks are displayed
Settings_Layout.launcher_collection_opacity_description: Adjust the opacity of collection backgrounds
Settings_Layout.launcher_collection_blur_description: Adjust the blur effect on collection backgrounds
Settings_Layout.launcher_show_empty_uncollected_descript: Display the uncollected section even when empty
Settings_Layout.list_coming_soon: Configuration options for list layout are coming soon!
Settings_Layout.grid_coming_soon: Configuration options for grid layout are coming soon!

Settings_Wallpaper.title: Wallpapers
Settings_Wallpaper.description: Upload background images for your home page. You can have up to {max} wallpapers and customize display settings for each.
Settings_Wallpaper.max_limit_reached: Maximum limit reached. Delete a wallpaper to upload a new one.
Settings_Wallpaper.empty_state_message: No wallpapers uploaded yet. Upload your first wallpaper to get started!

Layout_Launcher.delete_bookmark_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.
Layout_Launcher.empty_subtitle: Start by adding your first bookmark
Layout_Launcher.empty_import_alternative: Or import your bookmarks from a file
Layout_Launcher.delete_collection_message: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
Layout_Launcher.delete_collection_error_message: An error occurred while deleting the collection.
Layout_Launcher.delete_collection_error_message_retry: An error occurred while deleting the collection. Please try again.

Import.title: Import Bookmarks
Import.subtitle: Import your bookmarks from a browser export file (HTML format).
Import.file_section_description: Choose an HTML bookmark file exported from your browser.
Import.fetch_metadata_label: Fetch high quality icon and description
Import.fetch_metadata_description: Visit the link to fetch high quality icon and description. Will take few minutes to process
Import.collections_section_description: Choose how to handle each collection and select bookmarks to import
Import.validation_select_existing: Collection "{name}": Please select an existing collection
Import.success_modal_message: You can now go to home and check your bookmarks.
Import.success_modal_processing: {count} bookmarks are still processing in background. Check them out few minutes later.
Import.error_modal_message: An unexpected error occurred during import
Import.card_uncollected_alert: These bookmarks will be imported without a collection
Import.card_skip_message: This collection and its {count} {count, plural, one {bookmark} other {bookmarks}} will be skipped

Settings_DangerZone.title: Danger Zone
Settings_DangerZone.description: Irreversible and destructive actions. Proceed with caution.
Settings_DangerZone.delete_account_description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

Bookmark_ContextMenu.copy_failed_message: Could not copy the link to clipboard

DeleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
DeleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
DeleteAccount.warning_item_account: Your account will be deleted immediately
DeleteAccount.warning_item_data: All your bookmarks and collections will be permanently removed
DeleteAccount.warning_item_irreversible: This action cannot be undone or recovered
DeleteAccount.delete_failed_message: Failed to delete account. Please check your password.
DeleteAccount.unexpected_error_message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
DeleteAccount.confirm_modal_message: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action is
DeleteAccount.confirm_modal_data_removal: All your data will be permanently removed.
DeleteAccount.password_description: You must enter your current password to delete your account

Error.title: Something Went Wrong
Error.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Don't worry, your data is safe.
Error.help_text: If this error persists, please check the console for more details or contact support.

Settings_ApiKey.title: API Keys
Settings_ApiKey.description: API keys allow you to authenticate and access Shiori from API and browser extensions. Keep your keys secure and never share them publicly.
Settings_ApiKey.created_key_alert_message: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
Settings_ApiKey.form_name_description: A descriptive name for this API key
Settings_ApiKey.form_expiration_description: How long until this key expires
Settings_ApiKey.empty_state_message: No API keys yet. Create one to get started!
